verses.name: Ezekiel 44:7
verses.text: In that ye have brought into my sanctuary strangers, uncircumcised in heart, and uncircumcised in flesh, to be in my sanctuary, to pollute it, even my house, when ye offer my bread, the fat and the blood, and they have broken my covenant because of all your abominations.

verses.name: Ezekiel 44:8
verses.text: And ye have not kept the charge of mine holy things: but ye have set keepers of my charge in my sanctuary for yourselves.
